Module kivakit.core.network.email
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.network.email

Class Email

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.network.email.Email
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable
    public class Email
extends java.lang.Object
implements Validatable
    Models an email with:
    • A 'from' email address
    • One or more 'to' email addresses
    • A subject
    • A body
    • Optional attachments
    • Time sent
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
